#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Thermal Sensors =

A thermal sensor is something that gives the temperature in {{{<&deg;>}}}, a floating point number. Pythonically, it is something that supports the method {{{getTemp()}}}, returning a floating point number.

There are several implementations.

 * Physical I2C Sensor: Microchip TC74
 * Physical I2C Sensor: Analog Devices AD7414
